author: DevSarah
text: Staging is unusable. Redis is timing out at 40s. I'm bumping AUTH_TIMEOUT to 90s in the v2.4 branch just to get the QA demo through. DO NOT MERGE TO PROD.
message: Staging is unusable. Redis is timing out at 40s. I'm bumping AUTH_TIMEOUT to 90s in the v2.4 branch just to get the QA demo through. DO NOT MERGE TO PROD.

author: SecRob
text: Sarah, 90s is a DoS vulnerability. Max policy is 45s. If that hits production, we fail our SOC2 audit next week.
message: Sarah, 90s is a DoS vulnerability. Max policy is 45s. If that hits production, we fail our SOC2 audit next week.

author: DevSarah
text: Wait, did the v2.4 tag already build? I haven't reverted the timeout yet. Checking now...
message: Wait, did the v2.4 tag already build? I haven't reverted the timeout yet. Checking now...
